channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 7 - Backups Backup Strategy Who Has the Data What Data to Store When to Backup Where to Store Backups Why Data Loss Occurs How to Create Backups Who Systems Servers Network Devices Credentials Security Keys Ownership Legal Issues What Accounting Data Human Resources Web Assets User Data & Files Network Configuration Filesystems Metadata When Yearly Monthly Weekly Daily Hourly Instantly RPO vs. RTO Recovery Point Objective: How Much Data Might be Lost Recovery Point Actual: How Much Data Was Lost Recovery Time Objective: How Much Downtime Expected After Error Recovery Time Actual: How Long it Actually Took Image Source: Recovery Time Objective
